entries.name: LIST_TYPE_TO_HTML
entries.desc: Maps RDoc::Markup::Parser::LIST_TOKENS types to HTML tags

entries.name: code_object
entries.desc: The RDoc::CodeObject HTML is being generated for.  This is used to generate namespaced URI fragments

entries.name: from_path
entries.desc: Path to this document for relative links

entries.name: new(options, markup = nil)
entries.desc: Creates a new formatter that will output HTML

entries.name: handle_regexp_HYPERLINK(target)
entries.desc: target is a potential link.  The following schemes are handled:

entries.name: handle_regexp_RDOCLINK(target)
entries.desc: target is an rdoc-schemed link that will be converted into a hyperlink.

entries.name: handle_regexp_TIDYLINK(target)
entries.desc: This target is a link where the label is different from the URL label[url] or {long label}[url]
